Header: Self Employment Federation Goes to HRC against Ravi K.
Content: Self employment federation of Sri Lanka lodged a complaint at Human Rights Commission against finance minister Ravi Karunanayake. The complaint was lodged against increasing prices of motor cars and three wheelers due as a result of escalated unit rate tax. Meanwhile All-island three wheel driversâ€™ association also held a media conference on unbearable price hike of three-wheelers.
